snippet.title: Just Deal With It! | Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Just Deal With It! on PS4 with PlayLink launches on November 14th and is the best card game party ever! Use your phone to play your cards close to your chest in a whole new twist on five classic card games. 

Play Poker, Blackjack, Crazy Eights, Rummy and Hearts locally or on-line. Team up with friends and family, launch attacks, sabotage the competition, and go all in for the win, in this joyous card game party!
